## Course Overview

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-7}

Welcome to **"R by the Sea"** -- a one-week boot camp style course designed to help you harness the power of R for ecological and environmental research through project-based learning. 

For resources to learn R, check out the [Schedule & Resources 2025](schedule.qmd). It contains resources for the most recent iteration of this course.
